TunableList.name: BRANDED_TAG_DATA
TunableList.description: A list of tag to data used to show a branded logo on the item

TunableTuple.description: Tuning for branded logo to use.

TunableEnum.name: background_type
TunableEnum.description: Background to be used for it

Tunable.name: icon
Tunable.description: Icon to be displayed on the item

TunableEnum.name: style
TunableEnum.description: The style that defines where in the thumbnail we place this branding.

TunableEnum.name: tag
TunableEnum.description: Tag to use for the brand to be displayed

TunableVariant.name: tooltip_text
TunableVariant.description: Text for the tooltip shown when hovering the brand icon.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: Text for the tooltip shown when hovering the brand icon.

TunableVariant.name: tooltip_title
TunableVariant.description: Title for the tooltip shown when hovering the brand icon.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: Title for the tooltip shown when hovering the brand icon.

Tunable.name: BRING_HERE_INTERACTION
Tunable.description: An affordance to push on household members to summon them to the current lot if they are not instanced.

TunableList.name: BUNDLE_SPECIFIC_DATA
TunableList.description: Mapping from an MTX Bundle to its associated data. This is for bundles that should appear in the ui, but are not packs. This includes main menu icons, description, and the action associated with that bundle.

Tunable.name: key
Tunable.description: The MTX bundle id for the associated data.

TunableTuple.name: value
TunableTuple.description: Each bundle has icons and a description, as well as an data for the action performed when the bundle is interacted with either the PromotionDialog or the PackDisplayPanel.

TunableVariant.name: action
TunableVariant.description: The action that should be performed when this bundle is interacted with in either the PromotionDialog or the PackDisplayPanel.

TunableTuple.name: promo_data
TunableTuple.description: Data that populates PromotionDialog.

Tunable.name: image
Tunable.description: Image displayed in the promotion dialog.

Tunable.name: legal_text
Tunable.description: Legal text required for this promotion.

Tunable.name: text
Tunable.description: Text describing the promotion.

Tunable.name: title
Tunable.description: Title of the promotion.

Tunable.name: url
Tunable.description: External url to open from PackDisplayPanel.

Tunable.name: bundle_name
Tunable.description: Name used in pack detail panel and main menu. If empty, we fall back to using the MTX product name.

Tunable.name: icon_owned
Tunable.description: Bundle icon that is displayed in the main menu pack display when the player is entitled to that bundle.

Tunable.name: icon_unowned
Tunable.description: Bundle icon that is displayed in the main menu pack display when the player is not entitled to that bundle.

Tunable.name: short_description
Tunable.description: Short description of the bundle meant to be displayed in a tooltip.

TunableList.name: CG_CHALLENGE_DATAS
TunableList.description: A list of a challenge's data.

Tunable.name: cg_challenge_hashtag
Tunable.description: Hashtag of this challenge

Tunable.name: cg_challenge_name
Tunable.description: Name of this challenge

TunableList.name: CHALLENGE_DATA
TunableList.description: List of challenge event data for engagement challenge notification UI.

TunableTuple.description: Data for each engagement challenge event.

TunableList.name: challenge_list
TunableList.description: A list of tuples that describe each challenge.

TunableTuple.description: A tuple that contains data for a challenge.

Tunable.name: challenge_description
Tunable.description: The description of the challenge.

Tunable.name: challenge_name
Tunable.description: The name of the challenge.

TunableEnum.name: collection_id
TunableEnum.description: A CollectionIdentifier that is associated with this challenge. This is used by the UI to tie a collectible with this challenge. Use the default of Unindentified for challenges that aren't associated with a particular collection.

TunableTuple.name: event_display
TunableTuple.description: Display data for a challenge event.

Tunable.name: activity_complete_icon
Tunable.description: Icon to be paired with the challenge complete text. If not specified, the in-progress icon will be used.

Tunable.name: activity_complete_text
Tunable.description: Status text for when the player has met the challenge goal. This is currently displayed on a tooltip. If not specified, the in-progress text will be used. A CSS class of 'timeremaining' will have its color changed when the event is close to ending. The following tokens are available (same as the in-progress text): 0 - Number: Current collection progress, if available. 1 - Number: Collection goal, if available. 2 - Number: Hours remaining. 3 - Number: Days remaining.

Tunable.name: activity_icon
Tunable.description: Icon to display beside the activity progress bar.

Tunable.name: activity_progress_icon
Tunable.description: Icon to be paired with the progress text.

Tunable.name: activity_progress_text
Tunable.description: Status text for when the player is still making progress towards the challenge goal. This is currently displayed on a tooltip. A CSS class of 'timeremaining' will have its color changed when the event is close to ending. The following tokens are available: 0 - Number: Current collection progress, if available. 1 - Number: Collection goal, if available. 2 - Number: Hours remaining. 3 - Number: Days remaining.

Tunable.name: community_complete_icon
Tunable.description: Icon to be paired with the community challenge complete text.

Tunable.name: community_complete_text
Tunable.description: Status text for when the community has met the challenge goal. This text is only used when a goal is defined. If not specified, the in-progress status text will be used. Two Number tokens are available: 0 - Current community collection progress. 1 - Community collection goal, if any.

Tunable.name: community_goal_amount
Tunable.description: Optional collection goal for the community to reach.

Tunable.name: community_progress_icon
Tunable.description: Icon to be paired with the community status text.

Tunable.name: community_progress_text
Tunable.description: Status text describing the community's progress. This is currently displayed on a tooltip. This text is displayed even when challenges do not have community goals. Two Number tokens are available: 0 - Current community collection progress. 1 - Community collection goal, if any.

TunableTuple.name: end_time
TunableTuple.description: Date and time (UTC) for when the challenge event is expected to end. This is currently used to compute the time remaining in the UI.

Tunable.name: hour
Tunable.description: Hour (24-hour)

Tunable.name: event_icon
Tunable.description: An icon to use for the challenge event.

Tunable.name: event_title
Tunable.description: Title to display. If not provided, challenge name will be used.

Tunable.name: image
Tunable.description: The main image displayed for challenge info.

Tunable.name: info_link
Tunable.description: The url link to page for more info on a challenge.

TunableList.name: reward_items
TunableList.description: A list of tuples that describe rewards for challenge.

TunableTuple.description: A tuple that contains data for a challenge reward item.

Tunable.name: reward_icon
Tunable.description: The icon of reward item.

Tunable.name: reward_name
Tunable.description: The name of reward item.

Tunable.name: challenge_subtitle
Tunable.description: The subtitle text to be displayed in notification UI.

Tunable.name: challenge_title
Tunable.description: The title text to be displayed in notification UI.

Tunable.name: switch_name
Tunable.description: Server switch name to check whether challenge is active.

TunableList.name: CHEAT_SHEET_TUNING
TunableList.description: The entire set of cheat sheet hints. We iterate over this, checking each item against its tests to determine which should be visible.

TunableEnum.description: Set of conditions that, when true, activate this item in the list. EG, TS3_CAMERA_ACTIVE + IN_LIVE_MODE will be visible when the TS3 camera is active and the user is in Live Mode, and invisible if either of those aren't true

TunableList.name: control_elements
TunableList.description: List of elements that define this control item, which may be either names of Keyframes, or strings to display in this line item on the Cheat Sheet

TunableVariant.description: Either a string that defines a keyframe, or a localized string to display

Tunable.name: keyframe_string
Tunable.description: When variant is this type, defines the keyframe in CheatSheetIcon in GuiComponentLibrary.fla to display

Tunable.name: localized_string
Tunable.description: When variant is this type, specifies the localized string to display in this element

Tunable.name: item_description
Tunable.description: Localized text to display next to to the icon

Tunable.name: COME_NEAR_ACTIVE_SIM
Tunable.description: An affordance to push on a Sim so they come near the active Sim.

TunableList.name: DEFAULT_OVERLAY_MAP
TunableList.description: This is a mapping of MapOverlayEnum -> List of MapOverlayEnums. The key is used as the layer to be shown when no other overlays are present. The value is a list of overlay types that would result in the default layer being turned off if both are active.

TunableEnum.name: key
TunableEnum.description: This is the OverlayType that acts as the default for the grouping of OverlayTypes.

TunableList.name: value
TunableList.description: A list of OverlayTypes, that if turned on would result in the default OverlayType being shut off.

TunableEnum.description: The OverlayType that causes the default value to turn off.

Tunable.name: DLC_TRIALS_EXPIRATION_DIALOG_DURATION_IN_DAYS
Tunable.display: Dlc Trials Expiration Dialog Duration In Days
Tunable.description: Duration in number of days after trial expiration in which it's still valid to show the Trial Expired dialog to the player. This value also doubles as the number of days after conversion in which it's still valid to show the Welcome to Pack dialog. After this period of time, these dialogs will not be able to show when the player returns to the game.

TunableList.name: EARLY_PURCHASE_INCENTIVE_ALERT_TUNING
TunableList.description: Mapping of Pack to Early Purchase Incentive data to be displayed when the user pre-orders the product.

TunableEnum.name: key
TunableEnum.description: The pack associated with the EPI. This should really only have entries for EP14 or later as that was when this system was implemented.

TunableTuple.name: value
TunableTuple.description: Each EPI will have a set of tuning of images and text to display to inform the user what new features have been introduced in the pack.

TunableList.name: cycle_images
TunableList.description: A list of images (screenshots) that the UI cycles through to show off the items/assets that are part of the EPI.

TunableList.name: feature_list
TunableList.description: A list of tuples that describe each object/asset in the EPI Alert UI. NOTE: This should NEVER have more than 4 elements in it.

TunableTuple.description: A tuple that contains title text, description, an icon, and a reference to the matching lesson for this new object/asset.

Tunable.name: description_text
Tunable.description: A short description of the new object/asset.

Tunable.name: icon
Tunable.description: An icon that represents the object/asset.

Tunable.name: title_text
Tunable.description: A title to be displayed in bold for the object/asset.

Tunable.name: title
Tunable.description: The title to be displayed at the top of the EPI alert UI for this pack.

TunableList.name: ENGAGEMENT_MESSAGES
TunableList.description: Defines offline engagement messages on the main menu, keyed by destination name. Maps as a subset of values for the UMMainMenuTemplateData class in as3.un

Tunable.name: key
Tunable.description: Name of the destination these messages are assigned to.

TunableList.name: value
TunableList.description: List of engagement messages for a destination.

TunableTuple.description: Defines an engagement message.

Tunable.name: button_cta_url
Tunable.description: Url for when cta button is pressed. If button_text is defined this should also be defined.

Tunable.name: button_text
Tunable.description: Optional string to display on the cta button

Tunable.name: child_friendly
Tunable.description: When true this message can be shown to children

Tunable.name: description_text
Tunable.description: String to display for the description of the message

Tunable.name: image
Tunable.description: The main image displayed on the message

Tunable.name: layout
Tunable.description: Layout id, integer value.

Tunable.name: layout_position
Tunable.description: 0 = single large, 1 = left, 2 = right, 3 = middle

Tunable.name: layout_size
Tunable.description: 0 = large, 1 = medium, 2 = small

Tunable.name: link_cta_url
Tunable.description: Optional url for when a link in the description is pressed

Tunable.name: message_type
Tunable.description: Message type.

Tunable.name: title_text
Tunable.description: String to display for the title of the message

Tunable.name: video_url
Tunable.description: Optional url for when video button is pressed

Tunable.name: GO_HOME_INTERACTION
Tunable.description: The interaction to push a Sim to go home.

TunableList.name: LOADING_SCREEN_STRINGS
TunableList.description: Mapping from the Pack to its associated loading strings.

TunableList.name: value
TunableList.description: The list of loading screen strings which belongs to the pack. We always display the strings from base game AND from the latest pack which the player is entitled to and has installed.

Tunable.description: A localized string that may NOT require tokens.

TunableList.name: MAIN_MENU_PLAY_TEXT
TunableList.description: Defines text strings which can be shown under the play/new game button on the main menu. A message will be randomly selected from a named group.

Tunable.name: key
Tunable.description: Name of the group these messages are assigned to.

TunableList.name: value
TunableList.description: List of main menu play texts.

TunableTuple.description: Defines a main menu play button message.

Tunable.name: text
Tunable.description: String to display.

TunableList.name: NEW_CONTENT_ALERT_TUNING
TunableList.description: Mapping from Pack to its associated new content alert tuning

TunableEnum.name: key
TunableEnum.description: The pack containing the new content tuning. NOTE: this should never be tuned to BASE_GAME. That would trigger for all users.

TunableTuple.name: value
TunableTuple.description: Each pack will have a set of tuning of images and text to display to inform the user what new features have been introduced in the pack.

TunableList.name: cycle_images
TunableList.description: A list of images (screenshots) that the UI cycles through to show off some of the new features.

TunableList.name: feature_list
TunableList.description: A list of tuples that describe each new feature in the New Content Alert UI. NOTE: This should NEVER have more than 4 elements in it.

TunableTuple.description: A tuple that contains title text, description, an icon, and a reference to the matching lesson for this new feature.

Tunable.name: description_text
Tunable.description: A short description of the new feature.

Tunable.name: icon
Tunable.description: An icon that represents the feature.

Tunable.name: lesson
Tunable.description: A reference to the lesson that the user can go look at for this new feature.

Tunable.name: title_text
Tunable.description: A title to be displayed in bold for the feature.

Tunable.name: title
Tunable.description: The title to be displayed at the top of the New Content Alert UI for this pack.

TunableList.name: OFFLINE_IMAGE_LOADING_SCREENS
TunableList.description: List of offline image loading screen data

TunableTuple.description: Defines an image loading screen

Tunable.name: image
Tunable.description: The main image displayed on the message

TunableEnum.name: packId
TunableEnum.description: Which Pack Id this image references to. Base Game if it is not from a DLC.

TunableList.name: PACK_RELEASE_ORDER
TunableList.description: List of Pack Ids in release order.

TunableList.name: PACK_SPECIFIC_DATA
TunableList.description: Mapping from a Pack to its associated data. This includes pack icons, filter strings, and the credits file.

TunableTuple.name: packData
TunableTuple.description: Each pack will have a set icons and can have an optional filter string for use in Build/CAS and an optional Credits Title

Tunable.name: community_creator_name
Tunable.description: The name of the community creator who helped create this pack, to be displayed in the Pack Detail Panel

Tunable.name: credits_title
Tunable.description: The title used in the credits dropdown to select this packs credits. If set, there must be a creditsxml file for this pack in Assets/InGame/UI/Flash/data/

Tunable.name: dlc_trial_image
Tunable.description: Image displayed in the 'Trial Goals' dialog in manage worlds when the player runs a trial of this pack.

Tunable.name: dlc_trial_pack_goals_description
Tunable.description: A description of the goals associated with this pack. This is displayed in the 'Trial Goals' dialog in manage worlds when the player runs a trial of this pack.

TunableVariant.name: dlc_trial_region
TunableVariant.description: Reference to the region description catalog resource that will be shown in the 'Trial Goals' dialog in manage worlds when the player runs a trial of this pack.

Tunable.name: dlc_trial_title
Tunable.description: The title to display in the 'Trial Goals' dialog in manage worlds when the player runs a trial of this pack.

Tunable.name: filter_name
Tunable.description: The name to used to describe the pack in CAS and BuildBuy filters. If set, this pack will appear in the filter list.

Tunable.name: icon_128
Tunable.description: Pack icon. 128x128.

Tunable.name: icon_32
Tunable.description: Pack icon. 32x32.

Tunable.name: icon_64
Tunable.description: Pack icon. 64x64.

Tunable.name: icon_owned
Tunable.description: Pack icon that is displayed in the main menu pack display when the player owns that pack.

Tunable.name: icon_unowned
Tunable.description: Pack icon that is displayed in the main menu pack display when the player does not own that pack.

TunableEnum.name: pack_sub_type
TunableEnum.description: Which sub type of pack is this.

TunableEnum.name: pack_type
TunableEnum.description: Which type of pack is this.

TunableList.name: promo_cycle_images
TunableList.description: A list of promo screenshots and titles to display in the Pack Detail panel.

TunableTuple.description: Screenshots and label displayed in the Pack Detail Panel and Pack Preview Panel.

Tunable.name: image_large
Tunable.description: The large version of the screenshot displayed in the Pack Preview Panel.

Tunable.name: image_small
Tunable.description: The small version of the screenshot displayed in the Pack Detail Panel.

Tunable.name: title
Tunable.description: The title displayed over the screenshot in both the Pack Detail Panel and Pack Preview Panel.

TunableList.name: region_list
TunableList.description: A list of tuples that describe each new region in the pack.

TunableTuple.description: A tuple that contains metadata for a world select region.

Tunable.name: disable_view_lot_types
Tunable.description: When tuned, this disables the view lot types button in the World Info Description panel.

Tunable.name: is_destination_region
Tunable.description: Whether this region is a destination world.

Tunable.name: is_player_facing
Tunable.description: Whether to display this region in world select when the user does not own the associated pack

Tunable.name: is_summit_weather_enabled
Tunable.description: Whether this region has summit (EP10) weather enabled.

Tunable.name: overlay_layer
Tunable.description: Hero image displayed on mouse over of region in world selection UI.

TunableList.name: parallax_layers
TunableList.description: Images used for scrolling parallax layers for region in world selection UI. Max number of images = 5.

Tunable.name: region_description
Tunable.description: Localized description of region.

Tunable.name: region_name
Tunable.description: Localized name of region.

Tunable.name: region_resource
Tunable.description: Reference to the region description catalog resource associated with this region

Tunable.name: region_tooltip_override
Tunable.description: Tooltip on the world select. If none is set, will use region_description.

TunableEnum.name: region_type
TunableEnum.description: The region type for this region. Keep in sync with gameplay tuning at region->region type

TunableList.name: tourist_highlights
TunableList.description: Icon, heading, and description used to list points of interest when selecting world for vacations.

TunableTuple.description: Each highlight will have a set of tuning of icons, heading, and description.

Tunable.name: description_text
Tunable.description: The description.

Tunable.name: heading
Tunable.description: The heading text.

Tunable.name: icon
Tunable.description: Icon to be displayed .

TunableList.name: travel_only_lots
TunableList.description: Any lots tuned here are unselectable outside of gameplay travel/vacation flows, with text describing why this is the case.

Tunable.name: lot
Tunable.description: The lot that is unselectable in manage worlds.

Tunable.name: unselectable_text
Tunable.description: Localized text describing why the lot is unselectable.

Tunable.name: short_description
Tunable.description: Short description of the pack meant to be displayed in a tooltip.

Tunable.name: webstore_id
Tunable.description: web store pack specific url identifier

TunableEnum.name: packId
TunableEnum.description: The pack id for the associated data.

TunableList.name: PLATFORM_STRING_REPLACEMENTS
TunableList.description: A list of strings that will be swapped out when in use on different platforms. Each entry contains the original and replacement LocKey, the platforms to perform the swap on, and the input method that is in use when the LocKey is used.

TunableEnum.name: input_method
TunableEnum.description: The input method that should be in use when attempting to replace the original_string.

Tunable.name: original_string
Tunable.description: The string that will be replaced or ignored.

TunableEnum.name: platform
TunableEnum.description: The platforms on which the string will be replaced.

TunableVariant.name: replacement_string
TunableVariant.description: The string that will be used in place of original_string. If omitted, original_string will simply be ignored entirely.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: A localized string that may NOT require tokens.

TunableList.name: REGION_TYPE_HEADING_TUNING
TunableList.description: Mapping from region type to Heading information for world select screen

TunableEnum.name: key
TunableEnum.description: The regiontype that should get this heading data

TunableTuple.name: value
TunableTuple.description: Each region will have a set of tuning of icons and text to display in the heading.

Tunable.name: heading
Tunable.description: The text to be displayed at the top.

Tunable.name: icon
Tunable.description: Icon to be displayed next to the heading.

TunableVariant.name: vacation_subheading
TunableVariant.description: The sub heading to be displayed below the heading when selecting a lot for a vacation.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: A localized string that may NOT require tokens.

TunableList.name: SCALING
TunableList.description: Defines a min/max ui scaling value for a screen resolution.

Tunable.name: scale_max
Tunable.description: Provide a float value.

Tunable.name: scale_min
Tunable.description: Provide a float value.

Tunable.name: screen_height
Tunable.description: Provide an integer value.

Tunable.name: screen_width
Tunable.description: Provide an integer value.

TunableList.name: _elements
TunableList.description: The list of elements in the dynamic enumeration.
